thread.title: Zajdel, Kathy
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Zajdel, Kathy

author: Zajdel, Kathy
title: Zajdel, Kathy
text: Arron and both the ladies I dealt with are knowledgeable and took the time to investigate and evaluate all the random old coins and other items I brought to the Palatine store. The items they didn't deal with, they gave direction to someone that might help. I feel very comfortable going to them.
